ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: The blind and seeing are not the same
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Equal are not the blind and those who can see,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: The blind and the seeing are not alike,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The blind and the seeing are not alike
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And the blind and the sighted are not equal!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Not alike are the blind and the seeing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the blind and the seeing are not alike
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Not equal are the blind and the seeing man,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: The blind man is not equal with the seer;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: The blind and the sighted are not equal,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Not alike are the blind and the seeing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: The blind one and the seer are not equal,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: The blind and the seeing are not alike;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Not alike are the blind (disbelievers in Islamic Monotheism) and the seeing (believers in Islamic Monotheism).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: The blind and the seeing are not equal,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Not equal are the blind and the seeing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Not equal are the blind and the seeing,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [35:19] Nor are the blind and the seer equal, that is, the disbeliever and the believer [are not equal],
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (The blind man) the disbeliever (is not equal with the seer) the believer;
